module.name: Centrex extension
module.changelog: *1.8.11* Fill idefault description in device from default user field *1.8.10* Fix Follow me extension groups *1.8.9* Disable intercom mode on device creation page *1.8.8* Hide red alert div amour device and user mode *1.8.7* Change CDR(cnum) in macro-usercallerid to be acceptable in UCP *1.8.6* Fix in dialplan dor various CF feature codes *1.8.5* Fix useroutcid in macro-outbound-callerid *1.8.4* Fix ringgroups ltrim *1.8.3* Strip extra spaces in show sip peers info *1.8.2* Fixed queue strtoupper hook for static members *1.8.1* Added description with full user name to sip.conf *1.8.0* Fix for REFER when transfer call coming from trunk *1.7.9* Fixes for custom devices *1.7.8* Add automatic fill for callgroup,pickupgroup and accountcode *1.7.7* Add check for centrex+ext not more 20 chars *1.7.6* miscapps update *1.7.4* Addes hook for miscapps *1.7.3* Fixes in FC *1.7.2* Just check *1.7.1* Adopt "Custom extensions" *1.7* Add conferences to centrex groups *1.6* Add separate sibscribecontext for centrx group *1.5* Add restriction: centrex device can't call directly device from other centrex. *1.4* Hide sangoma info panel, fox for vm direct dial *1.3* Added bootstrap hook no hide footer *1.1* Fixed transfer operations *1.0* New name *0.1* Original Release *0.2* defaultuser added *0.3* description added
module.description: Provides a centrex extension in deviceuser mode.
